author: Yaya Kar
comment: The quote changes each time I tap my watch. I would love it if the quote can stay on the watch face a little longer so we read it. Maybe add or change the quote every hour. Like it but it need little work.
title: It's okay

author: Grant Hutchison
comment: Lovely clean look and I love the concept, unfortunately though the digital face positions the time so that it's unreadable if there's a notification on screen (making it useless when music is playing!)It would be nice to be able to configure the quote refresh time in settings too. Will keep an eye on this face though as I do really like the design :)

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Thanks for your valuable feedback :) Will consider your ideas when updating this watch face.

title: Very nice, but needs a little work

author: Tanya Horner
comment: It doesn't have the date, although the description says it has date on/off customization.

author: Sohail Mirza
comment: It needs a bit of tweaking which includes the date

author: Cody Cardinal
comment: Perfect.  Many of the quotes are favorites of mine.  Thanks devs!
title: Does as advertised
